name: Destroy The Line
description:
Chip-8 Game made for Octo Jam 9

Controls:

1234Q
W
E
R
ASDFZXCV

Each button draws a line at an angle. The objective of the game is to draw lines that hit the line at the top of the screen. As you do the line at the top of the screen will be drawn shorter each round. When the line length reaches zero an animation is played and the game starts again.

You may also choose to aim for the gap in the line and see how many times you can hit it.
